summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 DODGE RAM 1500. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FRONT LEFT TIE ROD FAILED WHICH CAUSED EXCESSIVE WEAR ON THE TIRE. THE FAILURE ALSO MADE IT DIFFICULT FOR THE CONTACT TO  CONTROL THE VEHICLE. THE DEALER CONFIRMED THE FAILURE, BUT STATED THAT THE COMPONENT WAS NOT UNDER WARRANTY OR RELATED TO A RECALL. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN, BUT THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 37,000.   UPDATED 3/21/11 *CN  UPDATED 04/04/11
